data.scheme_name: Gujarat Integrated Logistics And Logistics Parks policy 2021-Interest subsidy for development of logistics facilities
data.benefits: Scheme provide 7% intreset subsidy for 7 years on eligible term loan with ceiling limit of Rs 50 lakh per annum.
data.eligibility: All Units/ projects engaged in Logistics sector are eligible under the scheme.
data.conditions:
Minimum fixed capital investment of Rs 100 lakhs for development of logistics facilities.
Logistics Facilities as approved by the SLEC should be completed within 3 years from the date of approval letter from the Logistics Policy Cell.
A unit that has availed any incentive for the same assets under any other scheme of the state government, or any agency of the state government shall not be eligible for incentive under this scheme.
data.beneficiaries: All Units/ projects engaged in Logistics sector are eligible under the scheme.
data.prerequisites:
Minimum fixed capital investment of Rs 100 lakhs for development of logistics facilities.
Logistics Facilities as approved by the SLEC should be completed within 3 years from the date of approval letter from the Logistics Policy Cell.
A unit that has availed any incentive for the same assets under any other scheme of the state government, or any agency of the state government shall not be eligible for incentive under this scheme.
data.context: The main porpose of this scheme is “To facilitate and develop an integrated logistics ecosystem in Gujarat, to enhance competitiveness, operational efficiency and sustainability through innovation, skilled manpower, quality and disruptive technologies; there by strengthening Gujarat’s position as the preferred destination for trade and commerce.”
data.objective: The main objective is to create an efficient and competitive logistics ecosystem to support Gujarat’s industrial growth through regulatory reforms and streamlined processes.
data.description: Scheme provide 7% intreset subsidy for 7 years on eligible term loan(Minimum 2% to be borne by Unit/project in each case)for development of logistics facilities with ceiling limit of Rs 50 lakh per annum.
data.funding_facilitator: Gujarat Infrastructure Development Board, Government of Gujarat
data.funding_mechanism: Scheme provide incentive when a unit or project availing this policy's incentives, it must continue operating for at least ten (10) years after the date the incentives are received.
data.additional_info: Eligible term loan: Means loan sanctioned by a financial institution/ bank (except NBFC) for investing in GFCI or equivalent to GFCI of the enterprise. However, only the amount actually disbursed against the sanctioned amount will be considered for incentives under this policy.
